# Steering Bootstrap Output Contract

## Required Sections

```markdown
## Mode

Bootstrap

## Generated Files

- product.md: [one-line product overview]
- tech.md: [one-line primary technology stack]
- structure.md: [one-line code structure pattern]

## Extracted Patterns / Initial Direction

[Summary of key patterns detected from the codebase, or initial direction from task input and templates for greenfield projects]

## Next Steps

[Prompt review and approval as Source of Truth]
```

## Quality Criteria

| Criterion | Verdict |
|-----------|---------|
| All three core files are generated | Required |
| Patterns or initial direction are documented (not mere lists) | Required |
| No security information is included | Required |
| Each file is within 100-200 lines | Recommended |
| Follows the template structure | Required |
